mapper.select: SELECT product_id, row_number() over(order BY product_id )as NO, product_name, product_price, product_qty, created_at FROM product
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_name, product_price, product_qty, created_at) VALUES(#{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productQty}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_qty = product_qty+ #{buyQty} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
